title: Monthly exchange rate of USD to GBP 2017 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
The USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The lowest value at Month Mar 18 is 1.15x times less than the highest value at Aug 19.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and USD GBP exchange rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.
